title: Historical stock splits and corporate actions related to Everest Group Ltd

content.text: Everest Group Ltd goes public and lists its stock on the stock exchange.
Everest Group Ltd announces a 2-for-1 stock split, effectively doubling the number of shares outstanding.
Everest Group Ltd acquires a competitor company, expanding its market presence.
Everest Group Ltd declares a dividend of $0.50 per share, payable to shareholders of record on October 10, 2012.
Everest Group Ltd announces a 3-for-1 stock split, increasing the number of shares available in the market.
Everest Group Ltd completes a corporate restructuring, separating its business units into distinct subsidiaries.
Everest Group Ltd issues a press release announcing a share buyback program, indicating the company's confidence in its stock's long-term value.
Everest Group Ltd declares a special dividend of $1.00 per share, rewarding its shareholders for strong financial performance.
